subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: [SDWR-SpeakingToTheDeadWithRadios-] Try, Try Again,
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I checked out that group link and applied for membership. I hope it's not
like it sounds, a guy almost claiming he invented the concept. Even I don't
do that, I give originality to Stein, the Danish researcher that was
experimenting with swept radio back in the 80s. I've never been able to
communicate with him, but he's mentioned on the German VTF site, get to that
via Stefan Bion's EVPmaker links.

 F-S
